content: The word of the  came again to me, saying,
“Now, son of man, take up a lamentation for Tyre,
and say to Tyre, ‘You who are situated at the entrance of the sea, merchant of the peoples on many coastlands, thus says the Lord :
“Tarshish  your merchant because of your many luxury goods. They gave you silver, iron, tin, and lead for your goods.
Javan, Tubal, and Meshech  your traders. They bartered human lives and vessels of bronze for your merchandise.
Those from the house of Togarmah traded for your wares with horses, steeds, and mules.
The men of Dedan  your traders; many isles  the market of your hand. They brought you ivory tusks and ebony as payment.
Syria  your merchant because of the abundance of goods you made. They gave you for your wares emeralds, purple, embroidery, fine linen, corals, and rubies.
Judah and the land of Israel  your traders. They traded for your merchandise wheat of Minnith, millet, honey, oil, and balm.
Damascus  your merchant because of the abundance of goods you made, because of your many luxury items, with the wine of Helbon and with white wool.
Dan and Javan paid for your wares, traversing back and forth. Wrought iron, cassia, and cane were among your merchandise.
Dedan  your merchant in saddlecloths for riding.
Arabia and all the princes of Kedar  your regular merchants. They traded with you in lambs, rams, and goats.
The merchants of Sheba and Raamah  your merchants. They traded for your wares the choicest spices, all kinds of precious stones, and gold.
Haran, Canneh, Eden, the merchants of Sheba, Assyria,  Chilmad  your merchants.
These  your merchants in choice items—in purple clothes, in embroidered garments, in chests of multicolored apparel, in sturdy woven cords, which were in your marketplace.
